price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ߥߊ߲߬ߘߌ ߟߊߝߟߌ߬ߣߴߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߒ߬ ߕߍߡߊ߬ ߓߊ߬؟ ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ߥߎߦߊ߫ ߝߐߟߊ߫ ߝߊ߲ߘߐߓߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: a-ul'qiya al-dhik'ru ʿalayhi min bayninā bal huwa kadhābun ashirun
